update.description:
This is being broken into several pull requests:

* ~~pull request #167~~
* ~~pull request #168~~

---

### Current features

* Each plugin can either be `floating` or `docked`
    * `floating`: can be freely moved, resized and positioned on the screen above all others
    * `docked`: embedded into the window layout and 
* It is possible to transition from `floating` to `docked` and vice-cersa
* `floating` plugins' positions can be:
    * absolute within the window
    * anchored to the window or to another plugin (currently only settable from XML)
* The docks respect the plugin's `Layout.minimum[Width/Height]` settings
* As plugins are inserted, they're automatically docked

![docking_opt.gif](https://bitbucket.org/repo/64K5zaR/images/2290434147-docking_opt.gif)


---

### TODO

* Remove jump when hiding toolbar on floating state
* Save / reload split sizes
* Support setting floating plugin's background color
* Support dock repositioning
* Support other layouts (currently hardcoded to 1 horizontal split -> multiple vertical splits)
* Close anchored plugins when target anchor plugin is closed
update.title: Better layouting

content.raw: Also, as a lower priority, I was thinking of bringing back the dialog window as a 3rd state in the future. In that case, you could pop it out and minimize it for example.
content.html: Also, as a lower priority, I was thinking of bringing back the dialog window as a 3rd state in the future. In that case, you could pop it out and minimize it for example.
Great, I created issue #36.

content.raw: Not yet, but it shouldn't be too hard to implement. Actually, I don't think this was supported on `QDockWidget`, but it's not a reason not to do it here.
content.html: Not yet, but it shouldn't be too hard to implement. Actually, I don't think this was supported on QDockWidget, but it's not a reason not to do it here.

content.raw: Is is possible to collapse a docked widget? For example, I may have many docked widget but I only want 1 fully expanded.
content.html: Is is possible to collapse a docked widget? For example, I may have many docked widget but I only want 1 fully expanded.
